akn:content.akn:p:
§ 2329. Register of protected plant varieties The Secretary shall maintain a register of descriptions of United States protected plant varieties. (Pub. L. 91–577, title I, § 9, Dec. 24, 1970, 84 Stat. 1543; Pub. L. 96–574, § 4, Dec. 22, 1980, 94 Stat. 3350.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1980—Pub. L. 96–574 substituted “descriptions” for “published specifications”, and struck out provisions requiring maintenance of a file for other information.
